mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reservations (customer_id, flight_id, seat_number, seat_class, reservation_date, customer_name, customer_email) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{flightId}, #{seatNumber}, #{seatClass}, NOW(), #{customerName}, #{customerEmail})
mapper.update: UPDATE Seats SET is_available = #{isAvailable} WHERE flight_id = #{flightId} AND seat_number = #{seatNumber}
